DOC.HEADLINE: COMMUNITY NEWS FOCUS : NEWPORT / COSTA MESA / IRVINE ; NEWPORT BEACH ; FISH SEEKS CASH AND FOOD DONATIONS
DOC.TEXT: Cash donations also are accepted to help families torn by unemployment , abandonment , illness or divorce celebrate the holiday season . Money donations are welcome at FISH-Harbor Area , 177-F Riverside Ave . 133 , Newport Beach , 92663 . In-kind donors may call the organization at ( 714 ) 642-6060 . Year-round , FISH provides emergency food and rental assistance to families in need .
